component.name: doukutsu-rs
component.summary: A faithful and open-source remake of Cave Story's engine written in Rust

description.p: A fully playable re-implementation of the Cave Story (Doukutsu Monogatari) engine written in Rust.
Note: This flatpak is currently unofficial, that being made and supported by the community. Any errors or issues found must be sent to this flatpak's issue tracker
Note: This flatpak also and provides assets from NXEngine-EVO without any way to change them externally
